verses.verse: And<WG2532> Jesus entered<WG1525> and passed<WG1330> through Jericho<WG2410>.

And<WG2532>, behold<WG2400>, there was a man<WG435><WG99999> named<WG2564> Zacchæus<WG2532>, which<WG846> was<WG2258> the chief among the tax collectors<WG754>, and<WG2532> he<WG3778> was<WG2258> rich<WG4145>.

And<WG2532> he sought<WG2212> to see<WG1492> who<WG5101> Jesus<WG2424> was<WG2076>; and<WG2532> could<WG1410> not<WG3756> for<WG575> the crowd<WG3793>, because<WG3754> he was<WG2258> little<WG3398> of stature<WG2244>.

And<WG2532> he ran<WG4390> ahead<WG1715>, and climbed up<WG305> into<WG1909> a sycamore tree<WG4809> to<WG2443> see<WG1492> him<WG846>: for<WG3754> he was<WG3195> to pass<WG1330><WG99999> that way<WG1565>.

And<WG2532> when<WG5613> Jesus<WG2424> came<WG2064> to<WG1909> the place<WG5117>, he looked up<WG308>, and saw<WG1492> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> him<WG846>, Zacchæus<WG2195>, hurry<WG4692>, and come down<WG2597>; for<WG1063> to day<WG4594> I<WG3165> must<WG1163> stay<WG3306> at<WG1722> your<WG4675> house<WG3624>.
And<WG2532> he hurried<WG4692>, and came down<WG2597>, and<WG2532> received<WG5264> him<WG846> joyfully<WG5463>.
And when<WG2532> they saw<WG1492> it<WG537>, they all murmured<WG1234>, saying<WG3004>, That<WG3754> he is going<WG1525> to be a guest<WG2647> of<WG3844> a man<WG435> that is a sinner<WG268>.

And<WG1161> Zacchæus<WG2195> stood<WG2476>, and said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> the Lord<WG2962>; Behold<WG2400>, Lord<WG2962>, the half<WG2255> of my<WG3450> goods<WG5224> I give<WG1325> to the poor<WG4434>; and<WG2532> if<WG1487> I have taken<WG4811> any thing<WG5100> from any man<WG5100> by false accusation<WG4811>, I restore<WG591> him fourfold<WG5073>.

And<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> him<WG846>, This day<WG4594> is salvation<WG4991> come<WG1096> to this<WG5129> house<WG3624>, forsomuch<WG3754> as<WG2530> he<WG846> also<WG2532> is<WG2076> a son<WG5207> of Abraham<WG11>.

But<WG1161> his<WG846> citizens<WG4177> hated<WG3404> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> sent<WG649> a message<WG4242> after<WG3694> him<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, We will<WG2309> not<WG3756> have<WG2309> this<WG5126> man to reign<WG936> over<WG1909> us<WG2248>.

And<WG2532> it came to pass<WG1096>, that when<WG1722> he had<WG846> returned<WG1880>, having received<WG2983> the kingdom<WG932>, then<WG2532> he commanded<WG2036> these<WG5128> servants<WG1401> to be called<WG5455> unto him<WG846>, to whom<WG3739> he had given<WG1325> the money<WG694>, that<WG2443> he might know<WG1097> how much<WG5101> every man<WG5101> had gained by trading<WG1281>.

And<WG2532> he said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, Well<WG2095>, you good<WG18> servant<WG1401>: because<WG3754> you have been<WG1096> faithful<WG4103> in<WG1722> a very little<WG1646>, have you<WG2468><WG99999> authority<WG1849> over<WG1883> ten<WG1176> cities<WG4172>.

And<WG2532> another<WG2087> came<WG2064>, saying<WG3004>, Lord<WG2962>, behold<WG2400>, here is your<WG4675> pound<WG3414>, which<WG3739> I have<WG2192> kept laid up<WG606> in<WG1722> a napkin<WG4676>:

For<WG1063> I feared<WG5399> you<WG4571>, because<WG3754> you are<WG1488> an austere<WG840> man<WG444>: you take up<WG142> what<WG3739> you layed<WG5087> not<WG3756> down<WG5087>, and<WG2532> reap<WG2325> what<WG3739> you did<WG4687> not<WG3756> sow<WG4687>.

For<WG1063> I say<WG3004> unto you<WG5213>, That<WG3754> unto every one<WG3956> which<WG3588> has<WG2192> shall be given<WG1325>; and<WG1161> from<WG575> him<WG3588> that has<WG2192> not<WG3361>, even<WG2532> that<WG3739> he has<WG2192> shall be taken away<WG142> from<WG575> him<WG846>.

But<WG4133> those<WG1565> my<WG3450> enemies<WG2190>, which<WG3588> desired<WG2309> not<WG3361> that I<WG3165> should reign<WG936> over<WG1909> them<WG846>, bring<WG71> here<WG5602>, and<WG2532> kill<WG2695> them before<WG1715> me<WG3450>.
And<WG2532> when he had<WG2036> thus<WG5023> spoken<WG2036>, he went<WG4198> on ahead<WG1715>, ascending up<WG305> to<WG1519> Jerusalem<WG2414>.

And<WG2532> it came to pass<WG1096>, when<WG5613> he had come near<WG1448> to<WG1519> Bethphage<WG967> and<WG2532> Bethany<WG963>, at<WG4314> the mountain<WG3735> called<WG2564> the mountain of Olives<WG1636>, he sent<WG649> two<WG1417> of his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>,

And<WG2532> if<WG1437> any man<WG5100> ask<WG2065> you<WG1223>, Why<WG5101> do you loose<WG3089> him<WG3779>? Thus shall you say<WG2046> to him<WG846>, Because<WG3754> the Lord<WG2962> has<WG2192> need<WG5532> of him<WG846>.

And<WG2532> some<WG5100> of the Pharisees<WG5330> from<WG575> among the multitude<WG3793> said<WG2036> to<WG4314> him<WG846>, Master<WG1320>, rebuke<WG2008> your<WG4675> disciples<WG3101>.

And<WG2532> he answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> to them<WG846>, I tell<WG3004> you<WG5213> that<WG3754>, if<WG1437> these<WG3778> should hold their peace<WG4623>, the stones<WG3037> would immediately cry out<WG2896>.
